description:
SKIMS is a solutions-oriented brand creating the next generation of underwear, loungewear, and shapewear.

We set new standards with our game-changing products and are a driving force within pop culture. We are looking for an Allocation Planning Manager to join us in advancing the industry forward.

Are you ready to shape the future of fashion with us at SKIMS? We're on the lookout for an Allocation Planning Manager who thrives on precision and loves the thrill of maximizing sales while ensuring our products are always in stock.

Join Us and Be Part of Our Incredible Team!

As an Allocation Planning Manager, you'll be at the forefront of our mission to redefine shapewear and inclusive fashion. Your role is pivotal in crafting the SKIMS shopping experience for customers. You will collaborate closely with both the merchandising and operations teams to accurately forecast demand and develop allocation strategies that align with company objectives. You will create the allocation strategies that deliver our financial objectives and assortment strategies.

Why Choose SKIMS?

At SKIMS, we're not just about fashion; we're about growth. Our dynamic and supportive work environment offers countless opportunities for professional development. Join our team of industry experts, including Buyers, Planners, and Store Operations Managers, to collaborate, innovate, and elevate your career.

Your Impactful Responsibilities

  • Create the allocation strategy for Skims Stores that deliver financial budget / forecast and execute the assortment vision set by merchandising.
  • Lead allocation team and dive into sales forecasts, historical data, and upcoming events to ensure our products are where they need to be.
  • Partner with our procurement team to keep the product pipeline flowing smoothly and pro-actively troubleshoot areas of concern.
  • Create strategies to ensure inventory turns are on track by category and partner with cross-functional leaders to maximize or mitigate risk.
  • Keep communication lines open with retail managers, merchandisers, and suppliers for seamless allocation plans.
  • Identify process opportunities and lead change management for implementation and training.
  • Fine-tune and adjust allocations to meet demand while minimizing overstock and out-of-stock situations.
  • Collaborate with the warehouse team to ensure products reach the right places at the right time.
  • Train and develop team.
  • Stay ahead of market trends, competitor moves, and customer preferences to make informed decisions on product assortment and allocation.

Qualifications That Define You

  • Analytical genius with the power to uncover trends and patterns from large amounts of data.
  • Strategic thinker who relishes making decisions that drive success.
  • Motivational leader committed to team development.
  • Customer-centric: You possess an innate curiosity about customers, constantly seeking ways to optimize their experience.
  • Obsessively detail-oriented to ensure flawless execution.
  • Excel wizardry and familiarity with inventory management systems.
  • Excellent communicator who thrives in a cross-functional environment.
  • Master of time management, juggling multiple tasks with ease.
  • Adaptability and flexibility are your middle names.
  • In-depth understanding of supply chain processes, including demand forecasting and inventory optimization.

Skills That Set You Apart

  • Engaging leadership
  • Talent Builder
  • Inventory management
  • Forecasting
  • Problem-solving
  • Attention to detail
  • Excellent Communication skills
  • Time management
  • Critical thinking
  • Teamwork
  • Adaptability

Ready to embark on this thrilling journey with us? Join SKIMS and help us revolutionize the world of shapewear and fashion. Your career awaits!

$90,000.00 - $120,000.00 a year

Benefits And Culture

  • 100% Company Paid Healthcare (medical, dental, vision)
  • Kind Body Fertility Benefits
  • 401(k) savings plan with up to 4% match
  • Unlimited PTO
  • Full Access to LinkedIn learning
  • Employee Discounts

Perks (HQ Location)

  • Free weekly catered lunch at HQ – M/W/Th
  • Dog-Friendly office
  • Free Swag Giveaways
  • Annual Holiday Party
  • Annual Summer Party
  • Invitations to pop-ups and other company events
  • Complimentary daily office snacks and beverages

SKIMS is committed to continuously creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates, reflective of the rich diversity of the communities we serve. Equitable workplaces foster innovation and excellence, and in our commitment to culture of belonging qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.
